title: Patrick Murphy (Pennsylvania politician)
added: Murphy was nominated for the position of [[Under Secretary of the Army]] by the President Obama on August 5, 2015. He was [[Advice and consent|confirmed]] by [[voice vote]] on December 18, 2015,<ref>{{cite news|title=Murphy confirmed as Army undersecretary|url=http://citizensvoice.com/news/murphy-confirmed-as-army-undersecretary-1.1985069|newspaper=The Citizens' Voice|location=Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania|date=December 19, 2015|access-date=December 19, 2015}}</ref> and was sworn into the post on January 4, 2016.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.army.mil/leaders/usa|title=Under Secretary of the Army|publisher=Army.mil|access-date=2016-06-15}}</ref>
